title: Genetic variants in ATP2B2 as risk factors for mortality in patients unrelated but not associated with families with severe COVID-19
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): María Fernanda López-Bielma, Ramcés Falfán-Valencia, Aurelio Fierro-Piña, Edgar Abarca-Rojano, Elizabeth Córdoba-Lanus, Ingrid Fricke-Galindo, Priscila Romero-Villaseñor, Ivette Buendía-Roldán, Leslie Chávez-Galán, María Esther Jaime-Capetillo, Gloria Pérez-Rubio
